name: context-request
description: Request a context document using JSON schema, filters and modifiers

json.description: Context configuration in JSON format. It should contain the context documents with sources (file, tree, text) and any filters or modifiers to be applied.

name: context-get
description: Get a specific context document from the project context config

path.description: Output path to the context document provided in the config.

name: context
description: List all contexts in the project context config

name: file-info
description: Get information about a file within the project directory structure

path.description: Path to the file, relative to project root. Only files within project directory can be accessed.

name: file-read
description: Read content from a file within the project directory structure

path.description: Path to the file, relative to project root. Only files within project directory can be accessed.

name: file-rename
description: Rename a file within the project directory structure

path.description: Path to the file, relative to project root. Only files within project directory can be accessed.

newPath.description: Path to the new file, relative to project root. Only files within project directory can be accessed.

name: file-move
description: Move a file within the project directory structure

source.description: Path to the source file, relative to project root. Only files within project directory can be accessed.

destination.description: Path to the destination file, relative to project root. Only files within project directory can be accessed.

createDirectory.description: Create directory if it does not exist

name: directory-list
description: List directories and files with filtering options using Symfony Finder. Always ask for source path.

path.description: Base directory path to list (relative to project root)

pattern.description: File name pattern(s) to match (e.g., "*.php", comma-separated for multiple patterns)

depth.description: Maximum directory depth to search (0 means only files in the given directory) [default: 0]

date.description: Date filter expression (e.g., "since yesterday", "> 2023-01-01", "< now - 2 hours")

contains.description: Only files containing this text (uses grep-like behavior)

showTree.description: Whether to include visual ASCII tree in the response

treeView.description: Configuration options for tree view visualization

showSize.description: Show file sizes in tree view

showLastModified.description: Show last modified dates in tree view

showCharCount.description: Show character counts in tree view

includeFiles.description: Include files in tree view (false to show only directories)

name: file-write
description: Write content to a file (mostly new files, use apply-path for updates if possible). Can create parent directories automatically.

path.description: Relative path to the file (e.g., "src/file.txt"). Path is resolved against project root.

createDirectory.description: Create directory if it does not exist
